--- title: Core Database Requests keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "function wrapper around the discogs api for database interactions" ---

get_release[source]

get_release(user:UserWithUserTokenBasedAuthentication, release_id:int, curr_abbr=typing.Union[str, NoneType])

Get information to a particular release from discogs database. A release represents a particular physical or digital object released by one or more Artists.

# Example for usage of get_releases
get_release(user=user, release_id=6067651, curr_abbr="EUR")

<Response [200]>

get_release_rating_by_user[source]

get_release_rating_by_user(user:UserWithUserTokenBasedAuthentication, release_id:int, username='str')

Get the rating of a release for a given user.

# Example for usage of get_release_rating_by_user
get_release_rating_by_user(user=user, release_id=9453891, username="darkwolf")

<Response [200]>
